1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Encoding.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO.Encoding
6  ( hSetKoshuOutput,
7    currentEncodings,
8    progAndArgs,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified GHC.IO.Encoding               as Enc
12import qualified System.IO                     as IO
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.System        as O
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude  as B
15
16-- | Set I/O handle for Koshucode output.
17hSetKoshuOutput :: IO.Handle -> IO ()
18hSetKoshuOutput h =
19    do Enc.setLocaleEncoding Enc.utf8_bom
20       IO.hSetNewlineMode h koshuNewlineMode
21       IO.hSetEncoding h IO.utf8
22
23-- | CRLF input and CRLF output.
24koshuNewlineMode :: IO.NewlineMode
25koshuNewlineMode = IO.universalNewlineMode { IO.inputNL  = IO.CRLF
26                                           , IO.outputNL = IO.CRLF }
27
28-- | Encoding judgement string.
29--
30--   >>> currentEncodings
31--   "|-- ENCODING  /content 'UTF-8  /file 'UTF-8"
32--
33currentEncodings :: IO String
34currentEncodings =
35    do locale  <- Enc.getLocaleEncoding
36       file    <- Enc.getFileSystemEncoding
37       return $ "|-- ENCODING  /content '" ++ show locale
38                         ++ "  /file '"    ++ show file
39
40-- | Program name and command-line arguments.
41--   This function removes carrige returns from the arguments.
42progAndArgs :: IO (String, [String])
43progAndArgs =
44    do hSetKoshuOutput B.stdout
45       O.progAndArgs
46
